member.name: M:Gnostice.Graphics.Skia.SkiaGraphics.GetAvailableFont(Gnostice.Core.Graphics.Font,Gnostice.Core.Graphics.Font)
member.summary: Returns the same font object if the font is available, else returns the font closest available font.

member.name: M:Gnostice.Graphics.Skia.SkiaGraphics.ResolveToAvailableFontFamily(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the family name of the available font, else returns the font closest to the available font.
